text: Michael Anthony Cox (born December 30, 1961) is an American attorney and Republican politician. He was Michigan's 52nd Attorney General from 2003 to 2011. He was the first Republican to hold that office since Frank Millard in 1955. Cox unsuccessfully ran for Governor of Michigan in 2010. ==References== ==Other websites== * Mike Cox biography * Michigan Attorney General (official site) * Mike Cox 2010 for Governor (official campaign site) Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Michigan attorneys general Category:Politicians from Detroit Category:Lawyers from Detroit Category:People from Livonia, Michigan Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Mike Cox (American politician)
